name: sshkeyman
short_description:
You need to generate key-pair to every client that connect your server (through the SSH). This results to file with many keys which must be copied to every server that you manage. Once there is an exposed key in the set, it is difficult to remove such a key from every server resulting to potentional dangerous that forgotten server will be penetrated and compromised.

This small project is set of scripts that allows you to manage all ssh public keys on the single place. It performs synchronization of the keyfile and signing or verifying that file so you can use any public web-hosting to host this file as long as you keeping signing master private key at safe place.
summary: Set of scripts to manage ssh keys of many computers at single place
